structural_unit_name.en: Department of Literature and Theatre Research

name.en: Department of Literature and Theatre Research

structural_units.address:
Ülikooli 16, r 107-116b
51003 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: The course endeavours to provide an overview of Estonian literature in the period (1917-2015). Key topics include Estonian literary in the first independence period, literature in the Estonian SSR, and Estonian literature during the last 25 years.
description.et: Kursus annab ülevaate eesti kirjandusest aastatel 1917-2015. Tähtsamate allteemadena käsitletakse eesti kirjandust esimesel iseseisvusperioodil, pagulaskirjandust, kirjandust Eesti NSVs ning eesti kirjandust viimase kahekümne viie aasta jooksul.

objectives.en: To provide an overview of Estonian literature from 1917-2015, focusing in depth on the works of he key writers of the period.
objectives.et: Anda ülevaade eesti kirjandusest aastatel 1917-2015 ja süveneda selle aja kesksemate kirjanike loomingusse.

learning_outcomes.en:
Upon completion of the course the student 
- will know the main features of Estonian literature beginning with the group "Siuru" until the present day.
- is capable of making distinctions between the most important literary trends of the period.
- has read the most signficant texts of belles lettres in Estonian in the designated period.
